author: iSazonov
body:
[CI Appveyor failed](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/PowerShell/powershell/build/6.0.0-beta.6-5149) with

```powershell
[00:08:08] Describing Windows Installer
[00:08:08]    Context Universal C Runtime Download Link
[00:08:08]     [?] Wix file should have download link about Universal C runtime 42ms
[00:08:09]     [-] Should have download link about Universal C runtime that is reachable 1.3s
[00:08:09]       Error 404 - Not FoundWarning: This site requires the use of scripts, which your browser does not currently 
[00:08:09] allow.See how to enable scripts
```

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body:
This has been on-going. I can randomly repro this on windows 10, It appears to be an issue with the download server.
Ref #4720

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Ah, again a test with external server.

@SteveL-MSFT Maybe still request a permanent link for Universal C runtime?

comments.author: bergmeister
comments.body: The pending PR #4745 has a rewritten  test as it was decided to link against the GitHub page instead of the Microsoft one. Should this problem reappear after the merge then it might be better to just remove the test...

comments.author: bergmeister
comments.body: @iSazonov Can we close this now, i.e. have the new URLs fixed the problem of sporadic failures?

title: Test failed "Should have download link about Universal C runtime that is reachable"
